name: International Conference on Condensed Matter Physics
content: Spectus Conferences cordially invites everyone to attend its prestigious event “International Conference on Condensed Matter Physics (CMP MEET 2024)” which is scheduled to be held in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia during July 01-02, 2024\. CMP MEET 2024 aims to bring together leading academic scientists, researchers and research scholars to exchange and share their experiences and research results on all aspects of Condensed Matter Physics and related fields.
